name: Celestial Pirates vs. Military Alliance
description: In the year 3027, an emperor, Cornelius Farquaadius, controls most of the inner ring. In order to stop the sheer expansion of the empire, a rag-tag team of fighters known as the Celestial Pirates are pushing back Farquaadius's adancement into the Outer Ring. Now as a fresh, pirate recruit, it's your time to join the fight. Are you ready bucanneer?
